ygData.subject: Nostolo's Loc
ygData.msgSnippet: the approximate loc of the well is in South Karanas ( across the white bridge in NK ,,, )  go to  -35 , -25 ... From: Mike Wilson OTT  To:
ygData.messageBody:
the approximate loc of the well is in South Karanas ( across the white
bridge in NK ,,, ) go to -35 , -25

----- Original Message -----
From: Mike Wilson OTT <Mike_Wilson@...>
To: eqbards <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 8:58 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] A Few Questions for Fellow Bards....


> From: Mike_Wilson@... (Mike Wilson OTT)
>
>
> On Fennin Ro, there seems to be a rather nasty group of powergamers who
> take great pleasure in killing Nostrolo whenever he spawns. The first
> time I shouted for someone to help me find him I was greeted by the reply
> "Damn, now I have to hang around and kill him again." Nice... not.
> Another time, I saw him standing near a small hexagonal shaped stone
> plinth. Before I could complete the quest, some invisible mage nuked him,
> and then laughed at me when I suggested that he could have waited until
> *after* I spoke to him.
>
> Oh well, at the time I wasn't really ready to be wandering around SK. I
> should make another attempt.
>
> Maekew.
>
> 2) I also just picked up "Lisera", a lute that a bard in Qeynos needs
> tuning. He says that I need to take it to someone named Nostrolo in the
> "Karanas". But, I looked and looked and could not FINFD This Nostrolo
> person. Is this a broken quest, or have I just missed this fella? Could
> someone give me an idea where to look for Nostrolo? Also, is Lisera a
> lute
> you should KEEP, meaning is IT better than a regular Lute?
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> ONElist: where real people with real interests get connected.
> http://www.onelist.com
> Join a new list today!
